message.body: Steven won't stop talking to mason about beer and I'm just like herppppppp
weird assortment of people you've got there
Not intentional. Dan and Matt are here too, smoking hookah.
Dan and Matt, Mason's two friends that are always around.
oh, right, don't tell them i don't know who they are. tell mason boobs said hi, though.
How is Mason the cutest person? He's telling me all about how he raised like 70 chickens as a kid, and how he had a turkey that hated his "ma maw", so he had to
hug it every time she came to visit so it didn't chase her.
oh my god that's too cute
